Listen: Art Feynman “I Can Dream”

By Black Box Bob - June 18, 2020

Art Feynman is back this week with a new track entitled “I Can Dream” from his upcoming Half Price at 3:30 LP due out June 26th via Western Vinyl. The solo project of Here We Go Magic founder Luke Temple, this fourth single from the upcoming album follows on the heels of previous efforts like “Not My Guy”, “The Physical Life of Marilyn”, and “I’m Gonna Miss Your World”.

Twinkling keys open with a nocturnal gleam on Feynman’s new track. Exuding a dreamy mood, the singer’s higher register vocals match the notes in a soothing lullaby. Weaving a delicate spell of twilight tones and voice, his longing is audible as he sings “I can dream about you being made for me” while he loses himself in this dream of loving endlessly.
